author: cmpilato
msg: Cast a vote, and propose a revision *range* of svnsync-related fixes.

author: cmpilato
msg: Detect (and complain about) apparent meddling in svnsync-populated
repositories by methods external to the use of svnsync itself.
Document the svnsync revision properties at their #defines.
(do_synchronize): Check that the newly-documented condition on
throwing an error otherwise.  Also, if a revision has been
completely copied except for resetting the currently-copying prop,
(run_sync): Allow tests which expect svnsync errors.
(detect_meddling): New test which commits to the sync source and

author: cmpilato
msg: (svnsync_cmd_table):  Introduce the term "read-only mirror" to the
'svnsync init' usage text, and add blank lines after the "usage:"

author: cmpilato
msg: Minor comment tweaks (for consistency with others in the file).

author: cmpilato
msg: Docstring and comment tweaks and additions throughout.
